title: searching for a ranked team :)
body:
hey community,
i´m searching or a activ ranked team. i´m ranked in plat 3 atm.... would be nice if my team is on the same ranked lvl like me :) also i´d prefer a german team.
my english is quite good tho. so it wouldnt matter but the comminucation is just easier. 
main roles are jungle, adc and top but actually i can play anything.

maybe some1  is interested. just add me:) i´m rly hyped for some teamplay
